name_si: A THREE BED ROOMED LUXURY APARTMENT (FULLY FURNISHED) AT FAIRMOUNT RESIDENCIES-RAJAGIRIYA-FOR LEASE LOCATIONThis luxury newly built apartment complex is situated off Buthgamuwa road (down Perera mawatha) about KM from the Rajagiriya junction in a tranquil
name: A THREE BED ROOMED LUXURY APARTMENT (FULLY FURNISHED) AT FAIRMOUNT RESIDENCIES-RAJAGIRIYA-FOR LEASE LOCATIONThis luxury newly built apartment complex is situated off Buthgamuwa road (down Perera mawatha) about KM from the Rajagiriya junction in a tranquil
description:
DESCRIPTION
It is a three bed roomed luxury & spacious apartment (elegantly furnished) & with a panoramic view of the city & with plenty of ventilation, consists of three spacious bed rooms including a master bed room with an attached bathroom, a semi attached bathroom for the other two rooms & a visitors bathroom by the entrance, an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards & a service entrance, a utility room, a maids room with a separate toilet & two spacious balcony areas with a magnificent city view.
FACILITIES
The apartment consists of fully wooden flooring, has three phase electricity supply with four air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for all of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with centralized hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of individual shower cubicles, all of the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood & equipped with an refrigerator, a four burner cooker with an overhead hob, an microwave oven etc, the outer doors are fitted with Powder coated Aluminum frames & the apartment is elegantly furnished with quality new furniture & equipped with all electrical appliances. The building consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, parking, a swimming pool with a separate kiddies pool, a roof top garden, a reception hall, a gym, a large children's play area, regular maintenance & garbage disposal services etc.
SUITABLE FOR
Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats

name: A THREE BED ROOMED LUXURY APARTMENT (FULLY FURNISHED) AT GOOD HOPE RESIDENCIES SITUATED DOWN DE SERAM ROAD-MOUNT LAVINIA-FOR LEASE LOCATION This apartment is situated on the forth floor of a luxury apartment complex building situated down De Seram road (A
listing_address: 26/7 Good Hope Residencies , DOWN DE SERAM ROAD-MOUNT LAVINIA
description:
DESCRIPTION

It is an luxury & spacious three bed roomed apartment elegantly furnished with quality furniture & equipped with all electrical appliances & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, another common bathroom, an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards, a small store room & four balcony areas with a magnificent view of the city & the sea.

FACILITIES

The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with four air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for the rest of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities with an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer windows are fitted with Powder coated Aluminum frames, the sitting & dinning room areas fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & one of the bathroom consists of a Jacuzzi type shower cubical.

The building consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, a common roof top terrace area with a magnificent view of the beach & the city, one lift, a standby generator for the common areas, parking facilities, regular maintenance & garbage disposal facilities etc.

SUITABLE FOR

Foreigners, as well as Lankan expats

DESCRIPTION
It is a luxury & spacious three bed roomed apartment situated on the sixth floor & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, another common bathroom, an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards, a utility room, a maids toilet & one spacious balcony area with a magnificent view of the city.

name_ta: (APTL-COL06-2037A) Luxurious Condominium with Swimming Pool, Colombo 5 (Thimbirigasyaya, Havelock Town, Kirulapone, Narahenpita), Colombo - For Rent
name_si: (APTL-COL06-2037A) Luxurious Condominium with Swimming Pool, Colombo 5 (Thimbirigasyaya, Havelock Town, Kirulapone, Narahenpita), Colombo - For Rent
name: (APTL-COL06-2037A) Luxurious Condominium with Swimming Pool, Colombo 5 (Thimbirigasyaya, Havelock Town, Kirulapone, Narahenpita), Colombo - For Rent
description:
DESCRIPTION
This apartment is situated on the forth floor of the park tower building at Havelock city residencies, with a close garden view which is on the second floor (the building is mostly occupied by diplomatic personal from several embassies) & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, four bed rooms including a spacious master bed room two attached bathrooms, a common bathroom, an elegant & spacious pantry area with fitted cupboards & a service entrance, a utility room, a maids room with a separate toilet & two balcony areas with a magnificent view.

FACILITIES
The apartment consists of wooden & tiled flooring, has three phase electricity supply with six air conditioners & a fitted ceiling fan for the sitting room, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer doors are fitted with Powder coated Aluminium frames, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of of individual shower cubicles, the apartment is elegantly furnished with quality furniture & equipped with all electrical appliances plus cookery & cutlery as well. The complex consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, parking lots, a common large landscaped garden area, a large fish pond, a gym, two lifts & a standby generator ( a club house with swimming pool ,a day care, a gym,a function hall, a restaurant,a table tennis,squash etc)

SUITABLE FOR
Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats

name_si: (GH-APTL-COL04-1971) Luxurious Apartment, Furnished Kitchen, , - For Rent
name: (GH-APTL-COL04-1971) Luxurious Apartment, Furnished Kitchen, , - For Rent
description:
DESCRIPTION 
It is a completely refurbished four storied building conveniently located by the Galle road (with access to the Marine drive & with a wide road way with ample parking), each floor consists of self contained two bed roomed luxury apartments elegantly furnished (except for the second floor which consists of a three bed roomed apt & the forth floor which consists of a two bed roomed spacious duplex unit with an attic & a terrace area with a magnificent sea view), each apartment consists of a sitting & dinning room, one attached bathroom, another common bathroom & two balcony areas. Italian marble floors. Fully furnished, 2 rooms with AC. All areas have fans. 50" Plasma TV/DVD. fully loaded kitchen, bed linen provided'1 Master Room with attached bathroom, 2 other bathrooms, Laundry room, Internet and cable TV provided in both apartments. There is office space available with a floor area of 1300 sq.ft on the Mezzanine floor which consists of two areas which can be used as studio apartments or small office. Both with separate bathrooms, and small pantry. The building consists of a lift & separate stairways. 
SUITABLE FOR 
Ideality suited for commercial as well as residential use for foreigners as well as Lankan expats
description_ta:
DESCRIPTION 
It is a completely refurbished four storied building conveniently located by the Galle road (with access to the Marine drive & with a wide road way with ample parking), each floor consists of self contained two bed roomed luxury apartments elegantly furnished (except for the second floor which consists of a three bed roomed apt & the forth floor which consists of a two bed roomed spacious duplex unit with an attic & a terrace area with a magnificent sea view), each apartment consists of a sitting & dinning room, one attached bathroom, another common bathroom & two balcony areas. Italian marble floors. Fully furnished, 2 rooms with AC. All areas have fans. 50" Plasma TV/DVD. fully loaded kitchen, bed linen provided'1 Master Room with attached bathroom, 2 other bathrooms, Laundry room, Internet and cable TV provided in both apartments. There is office space available with a floor area of 1300 sq.ft on the Mezzanine floor which consists of two areas which can be used as studio apartments or small office. Both with separate bathrooms, and small pantry. The building consists of a lift & separate stairways. 
SUITABLE FOR 
Ideality suited for commercial as well as residential use for foreigners as well as Lankan expats

name_ta: (07APTLCOL03-1332) Luxurious Condominium with Swimming Pool, Colombo 3 (Kollupitiya), Colombo - For Rent
name_si: (07APTLCOL03-1332) Luxurious Condominium with Swimming Pool, Colombo 3 (Kollupitiya), Colombo - For Rent
name: (07APTLCOL03-1332) Luxurious Condominium with Swimming Pool, Colombo 3 (Kollupitiya), Colombo - For Rent
description:
DESCRIPTION
It is a luxury & spacious apartment consisting of two spacious bed rooms including a master bed room with an attached bathroom, it also consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room area with a magnificent view of the city & the swimming pool, an elegant pantry with fitted cupboards, a small utility room area, a common bathroom ,a balcony area & a maids room with a toilet.

FACILITIES
The apartment consists of wall to wall carpet , is fully air conditioned. Has three phase electricity supply with a standby generator for the common areas. Has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities with a centralized overhead tank for storage. All of the windows & glass panels are made of powder coated aluminum frames. The apartment complex consists of many common facilities including the adjoining Cinnamon Grand hotel facilities, has SLT PEO TV connection, has a separate swimming pool for the residents.24 hour security, parking facilities, Laundry service, several restaurants, sports complex etc.

SUITABLE FOR Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

name: (APTS-DEH-1936) Luxurious Condominium with Swimming Pool, Dehiwala, Dehiwala - For Buy
description: Located at Station Road, Dehiwala, this state-of-the-art Apartment complex offers the most panoramic view of the Indian ocean, one that is relaxing, inspiring and altogether memorable. What's more Marine City is situated in close proximity to schools, supermarkets, banks and financial institutions, and all modes of public transport in addition to many other essential day-to-day service providers.

name: (APTS-COL13-2037B) Luxurious Condominium with Balcony, Colombo 6 (Wellawatta, Pamankada), Colombo - For Buy
description:
DESCRIPTION
It is a three bed roomed apartment situated on the fifth floor & consists of a sitting & dinning room, three bed rooms including a master bed room, two attached bathrooms, an elegant pantry with fitted cupboards & one balcony area.

FACILITIES
The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with fitted ceiling fans for all of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with a centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware. The building consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, parking facilities, a common roof top terrace area, a lift & standby generator, regular maintenance & garbage disposal facilities etc.etc.

SUITABLE FOR
Anyone who likes to live by the city.

description:
DESCRIPTION
It is a luxury & spacious three bed roomed apartment,elegently furnished & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, another common bathroom, an elegant & spacious pantry area fitted with cupboards,a utility room, a maids room with a separate toilet & three balcony areas.

FACILITIES
The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with four air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer doors are fitted with Powder coated Aluminum frames, the sitting & dinning room areas are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & the apartment is elegantly furnished with quality furniture, which will be included for the sale. The building consist of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, parking facilities, two lifts & a standby generator, a roof garden with a magnificent view, a swimming pool, gym, regular maintenance & garbage disposal facilities etc.etc.

Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats

The building consists of ten floors including a common roof top terrace area with a swimming pool, gym, sauna, table tennis, pool tables, roof top garden with a kids play area etc & ground floor parking facilities, each floor consists of five apts

name_ta: (APTS-COL03-2078) Luxurious Condominium with Balcony, Colombo 3 (Kollupitiya), Colombo - For Buy
name_si: (APTS-COL03-2078) Luxurious Condominium with Balcony, Colombo 3 (Kollupitiya), Colombo - For Buy
name: (APTS-COL03-2078) Luxurious Condominium with Balcony, Colombo 3 (Kollupitiya), Colombo - For Buy
description:
DESCRIPTION
It is a fully furnished spacious luxury apartment consisting of two floors with the ground floor consisting of spacious sitting & dinning room area, an elegant pantry with fitted cupboards & an enclosed rear balcony area covered with glass, a utility room with wall cupboards & a common toilet. The upper floor consists of a small sitting room area with mirrored glass, two bed rooms with attached bathrooms & fitted cupboards & an enclosed balcony area covered with glass & a servants room with a separate bathroom.
FACILITIES
The apartment is fully carpeted except for the bathrooms which are tiled & the pantry & the balcony areas which are rubberized, has three phase electricity supply with 03 air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for all of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities with an centralized overhead tank for storage, the sitting & dinning room areas are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with imported sanitary ware too, master bed room consists of a King size bed ,a 29 TV & an attached bath room with bath tub, the second bed room consists of a Queen size bed and attached bath room with shower, the apartment is elegantly furnished with quality new furniture & equipped with all electrical appliances inclusive of a 29" TV with a DVD in the main hall, Washing Machine, Micro Wave Oven, Dishwasher, 4 Burner Cooker (1 with Electricity +3 with gas) LG Giant Refrigerator all cutlery & crokery too. The building consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, a lift, regular maintenance & garbage disposal services etc.

SUITABLE FOR
Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats

The apartment consists of Granite & tiled flooring, has three phase electricity supply with three air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for rest of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer windows are fitted with Powder coated Aluminum frames, the bed rooms consists of large built in cupbords,all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of individual shower cubicles. The building consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour parking, a common roof top terrace with a magnificent view of the sea, a swimming pool, a gym, two passenger lifts, a standby generator for the common areas, regular maintenance & garbage disposal services etc.etc.

SUITABLE FOR
Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

description:
Main Project Details

Land Extent - 51.22 Perches (1295 sq. m.)
Parking - Basement 24 - Ground floor 22 Typical Floor area - 10500 sq. ft.

Number of typical floors - 08 Mezzanine floor area - 3200 sq. ft.

The two Bedroom Mock-up apartment in 3 floor is ready for inspection Design Proposal Apartment Complex of 45 Units of 04 Types
Eleven floor levels
3 and half floors of structure in top most floors yet to be done (excluding roof terrace slab) 06 UNITS per FLOOR (in actual 5 units with a duplex unit sharing two floors) TOTAL 45 Nos. name_ta: (APTS-NUG-2105) A three bed roomed luxury apartment -nugegoda-for sale
name_si: (APTS-NUG-2105) A three bed roomed luxury apartment -nugegoda-for sale
name: (APTS-NUG-2105) A three bed roomed luxury apartment -nugegoda-for sale
description:
DESCRIPTION

It is a luxury & spacious duplex apartment built on two levels, the lower level consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, two balconies including a rear balcony with a maids toilet, the upper level consists of three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, another common bathroom & two balcony areas.

FACILITIES

The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with fitted ceiling fans for all of the areas & with provisions for air conditioning, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities with an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors, stairways & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer windows are fitted with Powder coated Aluminum frames, the sitting ,dinning & the bed room areas are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of individual shower cubicles & a bathtub. The building has many common facilities such as 24 hour security, a common landscaped front garden area, parking facilities, one lift & a standby generator,a common roof top terrace area,regular maintenance & garbage disposal facilities etc.etc.

SUITABLE FOR

Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

name: (APTS-MTL-2103) A luxury three bed roomed apartment on the seventh floor building situated down templar's road-mount lavinia-for sale
description:
DESCRIPTION

This apartment is situated on the seventh (top floor) of the building & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, another common bathroom, an elegant open pantry area with fitted cupboards & two balcony areas with partial sea view.

FACILITIES

The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with three air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for all of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer windows are fitted with Powder coated Aluminum frames, the sitting & dinning room arras are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of individual shower cubicles.

The building consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, a common roof top terrace area with a magnificent view of the city & the sea, a gym, parking facilities, one lift with a standby generator for the common areas, regular maintenance & garbage disposal facilities etc.etc.

SUITABLE FOR

Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

We own and manage a portfolio of over 20 apartments at Crescat Residencies. The apartments are fully serviced luxury apartment available for short term rent. Located at the heart of the city affording you with Beautiful views of the Indian Ocean and Beira Lake they are next to the Cinnamon Grand 5 Star Hotel and Crescat Boulevard Shopping Mall giving you access to over 15 restaurants, a food court and last but not least Shopping.

Facilities

Daily Cleaning, Free Unlimited Use of 4G High Speed internet, Land Line in the Apartment for Incoming Calls, 24 Hour Help-desk, Swimming pool, Gym, Sauna, Business Center and Secure Basement Car Parking

name_ta: Great Investment for your bright future
name_si: Great Investment for your bright future
name: Great Investment for your bright future
description:
Span Tower celebrating its 10th year proud to announced that we are launching our grand 12th SUPER LUXURY Project at Bambalapitiya with all luxuries finishes. Bookings are Opened Now...
If you are looking apartment for as your second house or investment purpose this a great opportunity. If you have buy an apartment from this location you have this facility also.
Why Chose for Span Tower at Haig Road?
1.) You can customize your entire unit with a choice between cool or warm colour scheme for fixtures, fitting and flooring
2.) Panoramic Sea View
3.) Attractive rental for investors and also Company will helping for found a client
4.) Very close to reputable School
5.) Affordable rates
6.) Superb Location
7.) Only Developer who are surviving in the market successfully completed the 12th condominium project in Sri Lanka
8.) Heart of Bambalapitiya
9.) Ideal location for two highways at Marine Drive and Galle Road
10.) On time Start, On time Finish and Issued passed all projects deeds
11.) Very experience Engineers & Construction team under direct supervising
12.) All needs are very close by
13.) More Privacy
14.) Customer can discuss payment plan according to their financial
SPAN TOWER 12TH PROJECT
LOCATION :- No 48, Haig road, Bambalapitiya.
UNITS-4, FLOORS-8, TOTAL 32 HOUSES
ORCHID - 1140 Sq.ft ( 3 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom, Kitchen, Living, Dining)
JASMINE - 1160 Sq.ft (3 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom, Kitchen, Living, Dining)
TULIPS - 1525 Sq.ft (3 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom, Kitchen, Living, Dining,
servant room & Servant toilet)
LOTUS - 1625 Sq.ft (3 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom, Kitchen, Living, Dining,
Servant room and Servant Toilet)
* Completion date 2015 December
* Payment method :- 1 Million Booking fee
:- from booking date within 1 month 40% of total value
(sales agreement to be signed After complete the 40% payment)
:- Balance 60% can be paid through the interest free
Please Note according to your convenience we can discuss any other payment option also.
Installment plan until 2015 December

name_ta: A TWO BED ROOMED LUXURY APARTMENT (FULLY FURNISHED) AT GOOD HOPE RESIDENCIES SITUATED DOWN DE SERAM ROAD-MOUNT LAVINIA-FOR LEASE
name_si: A TWO BED ROOMED LUXURY APARTMENT (FULLY FURNISHED) AT GOOD HOPE RESIDENCIES SITUATED DOWN DE SERAM ROAD-MOUNT LAVINIA-FOR LEASE
name: A TWO BED ROOMED LUXURY APARTMENT (FULLY FURNISHED) AT GOOD HOPE RESIDENCIES SITUATED DOWN DE SERAM ROAD-MOUNT LAVINIA-FOR LEASE
agency_address: No. 108, Asoka Mawatha, Sirimal Uyana, Ratmalana
description:
DESCRIPTION

It is a spacious & luxury two bed roomed apartment with a magnificent view of the sea from its balconies & consists of a sitting & dinning room ,two bed rooms with attached bathrooms, an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards & four balcony areas.

The apartment is elegantly furnished with quality new furniture & equipped with all electrical appliances.

FACILITIES

The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with three air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for the rest of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities with an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer windows are fitted with Powder coated Aluminum frames, the sitting & dinning room areas fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & individual shower cubicals.

The building consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, a common roof top terrace area with a magnificent view of the beach & the city, one lift, a standby generator for the common areas, parking facilities, regular maintenance & garbage disposal facilities etc.etc.

SUITABLE FOR

Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

name_ta: (APTL-BOR-2111) Three separate (two bed roomed) luxury apartments (with furniture) for rent in Boralesgamuwa
name_si: (APTL-BOR-2111) Three separate (two bed roomed) luxury apartments (with furniture) for rent in Boralesgamuwa
name: (APTL-BOR-2111) Three separate (two bed roomed) luxury apartments (with furniture) for rent in Boralesgamuwa
agency_address: No. 108, Asoka Mawatha, Sirimal Uyana, Ratmalana
description:
DESCRIPTION
It is an architect designed brand new luxury building consisting of three floors with individual apartments & a spacious car park area on the ground floor, all of the apartments are identically built & each apartment consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, two spacious bed rooms with attached bathrooms, an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards, a servants room (which could be used as an utility room as well) & a backyard (a rear balcony for the upper floors) with a separate servants toilet behind.

FACILITIES
All of the floors ate fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with three air conditioners on each floor, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & individual overhead tanks for storage, all of the doors, windows & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the sitting & dinning room areas are fitted with imported light fittings & elegantly curtained, all f the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of individual shower cubicles & some of the apartments are elegantly furnished with quality new furniture.

SUITABLE FOR
Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

name_ta: Destiny - Luxury apartments
name_si: Destiny - Luxury apartments
name: Destiny - Luxury apartments
description:
The Destiny Mall & Residency Shopping Complex Phase II is now available for sale. Consisting of 160 retails spaces on 3 floors; this shopping complex is a part of a luxury 200 unit apartment complex positioned uniquely in the central business district which is just minutes walking distance from the Galle Face Green, all Colombo 5-star hotels, 2 private schools, hospitals, banks, the Nawam Mawatha business district and multiple large scale future developments. The location is the epitome of inner city living. Prices start from Rs.5 Million onwards. 102 sqft to 330Sqft shop spaces available.

2 Bedroom Apartments Type C. Rs.24 Million upwards.

4 Bedroom Apartment Type C, available 7TH floor.

Call 0773300088 for more details.

description:
Ref- C2-018-3-06 Your dream Apartment is at calm residential area in Colombo. It is in good condition and fully designed by architectures. It is well-coated near leading private and government schools and leading super markets can be reached in few minutes. It has very friendly neighborhood and well developed infrastructure. It could be access to the playground, hospital, service centers, shopping malls, entertaining spots and gyms in few minutes.
The house has many common facilities such as secured, landscaped front garden area, parking facilities, garage and pipe-lined water. It has proper maintained front landscape.

name_ta: (APTL-MTL-2112) A brand new luxury apartment with furniture at blue Ocean residencies
name_si: (APTL-MTL-2112) A brand new luxury apartment with furniture at blue Ocean residencies
name: (APTL-MTL-2112) A brand new luxury apartment with furniture at blue Ocean residencies
agency_address: No. 108, Asoka Mawatha, Sirimal Uyana, Ratmalana
description:
It is an three bed roomed luxury & spacious apartment elegantly furnished, consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room area, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, a common bathroom, an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards,a maids toilet & three balcony areas with a magnificent view of the sea.

FACILITIES

The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with three air conditioners, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer doors are fitted with Powder coated Aluminum frames, the sitting & dinning room areas are fitted with imported chandelier light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of a bathtub & a shower cubical, the apartment is elegantly furnished with quality new furniture & equipped with all electrical appliances.
The building consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, parking facilities, a common roof top terrace area with a magnificent view of the sea, a gym, a lift & a standby generator, regular maintenance & garbage disposal facilities etc.tc.

SUITABLE FOR

Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

name_ta: Blue Ocean a luxurious apartment - Unit A - Siripala road - Sale
name_si: Blue Ocean a luxurious apartment - Unit A - Siripala road - Sale
name: Blue Ocean a luxurious apartment - Unit A - Siripala road - Sale
description:
Unit A Available on 1st to 4th floor

-All floors will be European standard marble finish polished glazed porcelain tiles.

-All doors will be high quality European standard solid wood with polished finish.

-All bathrooms will be European standard wall cabinet, Luxury Soft Close WC Seat, Bathtub or Shower cubicles, Wash Basin and Hot Water Gyser, Brass quality shower, mixer taps and bathroom accessories.

-All windows Rust proof powder coated aluminum and glazed.

-European standard Split type AC for All Bed rooms.

-Built in wardrobes with doors in Master Bed rooms.

-Super Luxury mahogany pantry cupboards fitted with the black granite top & wall pantry tile.

-Kitchen fittings such as European standard Cooker Hood, Cooker Hob, Built in Oven, 2-Bowl Stainless steel Kitchen Sink and Washing Machine.

-Swimming pool, fully equipped with modern gym facilities, Functional hall and Barbecue pavilion In Rooftop.

-Premium quality Stainless Steel and tempered glass balcony with modern technology and perfect finishing.

-Intercom facility from apartment to central security control system with CCTV video surveillance.

-Fire extinguishers, wet raises system, hose reels and exit signs and Air terminal lightening arrester.

-3 Phase 30A/230V electricity, 80 KVA Standby generator, 9 passengers high speed elevator, Water supply from the main line with metered individually, 24-hours security and Individual Car parking facility.

name_ta: Apartments in Colombo from USD 50 per day
name_si: Apartments in Colombo from USD 50 per day
name: Apartments in Colombo from USD 50 per day
description:
Peace of Mind Residencies [www.colomborooms.com] is undoubtedly the best VALUE FOR MONEY option for travellers searching for budget accommodation in Colombo, Sri Lanka.
The Colombo Apartments and the Colombo Rooms that the Peace of Mind Residencies offer are conveniently located in the very HEART of the city of Colombo. Situated in Colombo 8 it has easy access to most parts of Colombo especially Colombo 3, 4, 5, 6 and 7 within 5 to 10 minutes taxi or trishaw ride.

Peace of Mind Residencies [www.colomborooms.com] is an ideal low cost and homely option for those searching for budget yet comfortable cozy and clean hotels in Colombo.
Peace of Mind Residencies offers you two types of cost effective options for short stays in Colombo, Sri Lanka.

Its Apartments in Colombo include one doubled bed roomed apartment [ US $ 50: accommodates 2]] and a two double bed roomed apartment in Colombo [US $ 64: accommodates 4] Both apartments are equipped with fans, an excellent tiled and spacious modern toilet, sitting room overlooking the garden, pantry equipped with refrigerator, gas cooker, electric kettle, utensils, crockery and cutlery, and a court yard.

name_ta: 2 bedroom luxurious apartment - SkyGardens - in Rajagiriya for sale
name_si: 2 bedroom luxurious apartment - SkyGardens - in Rajagiriya for sale
name: 2 bedroom luxurious apartment - SkyGardens - in Rajagiriya for sale
description:
Ready for a life of luxury in your lavish home in the clouds? In just 3 months you could be living the lifestyle you have been dreaming of. With wonderful panoramic views and unsurpassed elegance, Sky Gardens brings you every comfort and amenity you need with all the conveniences you expect and more.

The Sky Gardens is a magnificent and awe-inspiring high- rise with an impeccable pedigree and real cachet. From the unprecedented elegance of its architectural brilliance to the beauty of its surroundings, nestled in the scenic natural wetlands, overlooking the Diyawanna Lake and the Colombo cityscape, Fairway Sky Gardens resonates epitome of luxury vertical living. Built with straight-line minimalist style architecture, the state-of-the-art apartments at Sky Gardens stand testimony to the aesthetic design and modern engineering features Fairway Group is renowned for. 

This iconic creation is a design that features a wide range of resort like amenities such as a roof top sky garden, a large swimming pool, state- of-the-art gym, badminton court, squash court, basketball court, clubhouse, diner and tennis court making life at the Sky Gardens a truly unique castle in the sky experience. Built with straight-line minimalist style architecture and well-planned landscaped terrace gardens, SkyGardens will be as much of a wonder to behold, as it will be to live in.

This iconic creation is a design that features a wide range of resort like amenities such as a roof top sky garden, a large swimming pool, state- of-the-art gym, badminton court, squash court, basketball court, clubhouse, diner and tennis court making life at the Sky Gardens a truly unique castle in the sky experience. Built with straight-line minimalist style architecture and well-planned landscaped terrace gardens, SkyGardens will be as much of a wonder to behold, as it will be to live in.

description: Embrace the plush lifestyle of The Elements. The latest luxury living development by the Fairway Group. Engineered to reflect a consummate blend of nature and man-made splendor located in the heart of Rajagiriya. Surrounded by lush greenery, lakes and waterways, it is designed in keeping with our trademark minimalist and straight line architecture. 3 & 4 bedroom apartments with two carports each, a host of unparalleled facilities and access to the Fairway Sports Complex make The Elements the pinnacle of luxury living.

name_ta: APARTMENT FOR RENT
name_si: APARTMENT FOR RENT
name: APARTMENT FOR RENT
description:
It is an three bed roomed luxury & spacious apartment, fully furnished & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom another common bathroom, an elegant & spacious open pantry area with fitted cupboards & a long balcony area connecting the sitting room & the bed rooms
The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with three air conditioners, pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer doors are made using Powder coated Aluminum frames, the sitting & dinning room areas are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of individual shower cubicles, the apartment is elegantly furnished with quality new furniture & equipped with all electrical appliances.

SUITABLE FOR
Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

name_ta: Furnished Apartment - with air conditioning in Colombo 6 (Wellawatta, Pamankada) for sale
name_si: Furnished Apartment - with air conditioning in Colombo 6 (Wellawatta, Pamankada) for sale
name: Furnished Apartment - with air conditioning in Colombo 6 (Wellawatta, Pamankada) for sale
description:
950 sqft Furnished Apartment with air conditioning, for sale at Pamankade in Colombo 6 (Wellawatta, Pamankada), Colombo.

This well-appointed, bright & airy 2 BR apartment with an extra Office (3rd BR) is the ideal home for an Executive single or couple. The location of PANORAMA Residencies off Havelock Road make this a very convenient, yet stylish address with access to leisure facilities & all amenities needed.The PANORAMA features many attractive in-house facilities, such as a pool, small gym and business center, in-house dining with room service if required. The apartment itself is tastefully furnished with stylish contemporary furniture & wooden flooring.

Technical Equipment: A/C in all rooms, 3-phase electricity, telephone lines, WIFI Other Services: In-house Maintenance Team 24-hr on call, security & access control, cleaning service, in-house dining with room service if required, business center.

name: Exclusive, Serviced 2 Bedroom Apartment in Crescat (5th Floor)
description:
AVAILABLE FROM FEBRUARY 2014
Our apartments are ideal for short or long business trips or relaxing leisure holidays with all the wonderful tourist sights of Colombo, Sri Lanka.

If you are relocating to Colombo, moving from home, between houses or just searching for the right place, Crescat offers the best in serviced apartments. It is our pleasure to ensure that your stay with us is unique, memorable and comfortable providing you with a home away from home with all the services of a 5 star Hotel.
The Two Bedroom Apartment is an extremely nice fully furnished flat with large living room, separate w/c - fully fitted itchen, stairs leading down to a very quiet extremely large master bedroom (super king size bed) and the second bedroom a small double, with a full bathroom. We do also have a sofa bed in the living room to accommodate guests.
Ideal for smaller families, this apartment boasts a master bedroom with full en-suite facilities, 2nd double bedroom with separate bathroom, a modern kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances plus a large reception room with plenty of natural light and ample space to relax.

Rental rates:
Rates for Fully Serviced Crescat Luxury Apartments 2013/14
Period : 1st Sep 2013 - 31st Aug 2014
Peak Period : 10th Dec 2013- 15th Jan 2014
Currency : US$
Non-Peak Rates & Peak Rates

2 Bed Room Apt/4 people
Daily 170$ - Peak rates 240$
Weekly 1100$ - Peak Rates 1600$
Monthly 3500$ - Peak Rates 4900$

name_si: Colombo, Colombo 6 (Wellawatta, Pamankada)
name: 3 Bedroom furnished apartment at Harmers Avanue
description:
AVAILABLE FROM FEBRUARY 2014

It is a3 Bedroom apartment at "New Frontier Towers", beautifully furnished ,fully air-conditioned in Colombo 06. This apartment is within the beach lifestyle and offers easy access to the two main roads (Galle Road and Marine Drive). Also walking distance to supermarket' restaurants (both local and international)and 30 meters to the beach.

This apartment offers three spacious bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, master bedroom with en suite and hot water. 1 queen bed and 3 single beds., Washing machine included. It has a very generous living and dining area, with comfortable modern furniture.

There are fans to all bedrooms, lounge and dining areas. Kitchen with granite bench-top and Mahogany pantry cupboards, fully equipped with refrigerator, kettle, stove and microwave, crockery & cutlery provided.

The complex displays panoramic entertainment roof top views of the ocean and surrounding city. Ground floor: reserved parking, lift serving all floors, Stand-by generator to service and stand-by water pump. Beautiful entrance with visitor's lobby 24hr security with password protected access code entry. And Internet access also available Electricity usage will be calculated at the end of the stay, based on meter readings. Phone charges will be determined according to usage Towers"

name_si: Colombo, Colombo 3 (Kollupitiya)
name: Exclusive, Serviced 2 Bedroom Apartment in Monarch (5th Floor)
description:
AVAILABLE FROM FEBRUARY 2014

Our apartments are ideal for short or long business trips or relaxing leisure holidays with all the wonderful tourist sights of Colombo, Sri Lanka. If you are relocating to Colombo, moving from home, between houses or just searching for the right place, Monarch offers the best in serviced apartments. It is our pleasure to ensure that your stay with us is unique, memorable and comfortable providing you with a home away from home with all the services of a 5 star Hotel.

The Two Bedroom Apartment is an extremely nice fully furnished flat with large living room, separate w/c - fully fitted kitchen, stairs leading down to a very quiet extremely large master bedroom (super king size bed) and the second bedroom a small double, with a full bathroom. We do also have a sofa bed in the living room to accommodate guests. Ideal for smaller families, this apartment boasts a master bedroom with full en-suite facilities, 2nd double bedroom with separate bathroom, a modern kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances plus a large reception room with plenty of natural light and ample space to relax.

Rental rates: Rates for Fully Serviced Monarch Luxury Apartments 2013/14 Period : 1st Sep 2013 - 31st Aug 2014 Peak Period : 10th Dec 2013- 15th Jan 2014 Currency : US$ Non-Peak Rates & Peak Rates 2 Bed Room Apt/4 people Daily 170$ - Peak rates 240$ Weekly 1100$ - Peak Rates 1600$ Monthly 3500$ - Peak Rates 4900$

name_si: Colombo, Colombo 2 (Union Place, Slave Island)
name: Elegant and modern 2 Bed room Apartment at Colombo 2
description:
AVAILABLE FROM FEBRUARY 2014

This Apartment: A spacious, elegant and modern residence in the heart of Colombo. Fantastic home-stay experience for business or leisure travelers.Very competitive

Introductory price of US$130 per night.Sleep sup to 04 persons. Two beautifully furnished,air conditioned bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, including hot water. Separate twin beds in one bedroom. Double bed in the second. Bedrooms equipped with wardrobes, comfortable mattresses and fresh linen.

Well-furnished sitting and dining area complete with cable TV, DVD player and unlimited Internet Wi-Fi access. Fully-equipped separate kitchen with cutlery, crockery and utensils. In-house laundry and ironing facilities. Brooke Short Stay Apartment comes with a well-maintained balcony terrace offering a panoramic view of the city. Shopping malls, supermarkets, dry cleaners, hospital facilities, Pizza Hut, KFC,Bread Talk, JAIC Hilton, Gangarama Temple and the Beira Lake are all within walking distance.

Smoking permitted outside on the balcony terrace only. No pets allowed. Housekeeping provided every 04 days free of charge. (Available from 23rh March 2013)

name_ta: Fully Serviced Apartment for Rent in Colombo
name_si: Fully Serviced Apartment for Rent in Colombo
name: Fully Serviced Apartment for Rent in Colombo
description:
Offering luxurious 5-star accommodation, Monarch Apartments is located in the heart of Colombo city within 500 metres from Beira Lake and the famous Galle Face. It operates a 24-hour front desk and provides modern apartments with free Wi-Fi access.

Fitted with parquet flooring, spacious air-conditioned apartments feature a dining area and a separate living room with sofa, flat-screen TV and CD player. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer, shower and free toiletries. A washing machine, stove, fridge and oven are provided in the kitchen.

At Monarch Apartments, guests can enjoy swimming at the outdoor pool or indulge in a pampering massage at the spa. A gym, business centre and tour desk is also available for guests convenience.

While not housing a restaurant, guests can still enjoy a variety of local dishes served at the restaurants situated in Crescat Boulevard shopping mall, a few minutes walk away.

Monarch Apartments is conveniently 1 km from Slave Island Railway Station and the heritage building of The Colombo Dutch Hospital. The National Museum of Colombo is 2 km away, while Bandaranaike International Airport is within a 30 km drive.

connection. Bedroom is fully air-conditioned  with a fully tiled attached

name_ta: A very cozy newly built spacious apartment for rent
name_si: A very cozy newly built spacious apartment for rent
name: A very cozy newly built spacious apartment for rent
description:
A very cozy newly built spacious apartment with a master bedroom and a second bedroom, both air-conditioned and with attached toilets, having separate entrance and parking so guests can move in and out independently any time of day or night.

The master bedroom is spacious and opens to the balcony with a view of the birds and wetland. Take an afternoon siesta with the windows open to the cool breeze or opt for air-conditioned with a view from the bedroom. The attached walk-in wardrobe and toilet is spacious and provided with all amenities of a modern toilet for a very comfortable stay. The king size bed is with a 15-inch mattress and many pillows so guests can sleep well in deep slumber to wake up fresh and fully rejuvenated the next morning.

The second bedroom has a queen size double bed with comfortable space for a couple or single individual to sleep and relax along with the comfort of all amenities of a bedroom

Living Space

This apartment has a large living area with great view overlooking the wetland and birdlife that abuts the property by a flowing canal.

Sit out the mornings in the balcony sipping a cocktail and enjoying the ambience of a Colombo suburb right in the city centre. The bird life peaks early morning with the sunrise which is usually around 6:30AM. The afternoon heat is not felt in this part of the city with the constant breeze that comes over the marshland. The evenings too are quiet except for the sounds of the crickets and other marsh-life at night which can also be entertaining and relaxing.

Dining room cum pantry fully equipped with all amenities and catered to on request of guests. Have breakfast, lunch and dinner whilst enjoying the breeze that blows across the open space and panoramic view.

After dinner relax with a book in the reading corner by the heritage wall on the easy chairs.

Location

Exactly 1 km down Gothami Road in Colombo 08 as directed in the map.

This location is 6km to Colombo Fort area for those who have business to attend to. Spend evenings with peace and quiet and get a good nights sleep even if you have a busy day in the metro area. It is just 3.5km to the Town Hall, for shopping at places such as ODEL, Paradise Road, Crescat and many more. It is central to all parts of Colombo and the host Neil will arrange for a known and reliable tuk-tuk to take guests around the city for shopping, site seeing, work or just a leisurely drive around.

Rates:

Whole Apartment = USD 100/-

Sleeps 4 in two rooms, having exclusive access to the common living space of the apartment.

2 Extra beds can be provided at an additional charge.

Master Bedroom Only = USD 60/-

Sleeps 2 in king size bed, having exclusive access to the common living space of the apartment.

Small Bedroom Only = USD 40/-

Sleeps 2 in queen size bed, having non-exclusive access to the common living space of the apartment and can be booked separately, and bookings will be confirmed only within a month from arrival.

Food and beverage services provided in-house for all meals to be coordinated on arrival.

name_ta: ,   , 1660 sqft  - Perera Mawatha, Kotuwegoda, Rajagiriya, Sri Jayawardanapura Kotte
name_si: Sri Jayawardanapura Kotte, Rajagiriya
name: Luxurious 2 Bedroom Apartment for sale
description:
Spacious living and dining area. 2 bedroom with terrace. Maids room and toilet with separate entry.

Total area 1660 sqft

Covered area 1210 sqft

Terrace area 450 sqft

Located on the boundary of Rajagiriya and Kotte, Clearpoint residences is within easy access of Central Colombo, yet separate from the hustle and bustle of the city.  The tranquil environs of Kotuwegoda, by the tributaries of the Diyawanna Lake, provide the perfect balance of urban living in harmony with nature in what was the capital city of the ancient Kingdom of Kotte.

This location is well served by supermarkets and shopping areas, whilst also having national and international schools in close proximity.  The Sri Jayawardenapura General Hospital, amongst other well-established clinics, is easily accessed from the Residencies.  Public libraries can also be found in neighbouring areas.

The newly rejuvenated Diyatha Uyana is just across the lake from Clearpoint, providing local entertainment, a weekly organic farm, and weekend markets, as well as a small aquarium.  This area is perfect for serene walks, with food outlets nearby and the Waters Edge Hotel in near proximity.

This includes ensuring a structure that survives the tests of time and has minimum impact on the adjacent environs, while concurrently providing a pleasant and secure home for owners. The designer's aim is to offer sophisticated urban living in a serene countryside setting, harking back to the days of yore when one could pluck fruits from the garden and learn firsthand about the birds and butterflies that would frequent it.

Clearpoint Residencies have built in processors which will reduce your carbon foot print and more importantly reduce the maintenance cost across the board. We believe that inhabiting this living tower will be more cost effective than any residence you have lived in before due to the carefully thought out additions that have been provided.

Windows & Terraces: 
One of the main reasons for heat gain within an apartment is the fact that all apartments in Sri Lanka have windows which are directly exposed to sunlight. To counter this effect, we have consciously designed our entire building with windows that do not receive direct sunlight. We achieve this by extending ordinary balconies into large format terraces. This, while providing the practical benefit of shade, will also provide the occupants with extra external entertainment space.

Air Conditioning:
Since the apartments will gain no heat due to direct exposure to sunlight, it was possible to reduce the size of the air conditioners, thus requiring less energy to cool the apartments. In addition, all apartments are cross ventilated for the purpose of cooling the inside naturally.

Planted Terraces:
Planting on the terraces give the building its unique look but there is a more practical reason for the planting. Plants have a natural tendency to absorb sound, both internally and externally. Plants provide shade, cooling the terraces and buffering radiant heat (heat that can reflect off the occupants terrace if the tiles heat up). Oxygen produced during the daytime means cleaner air, while leaves act as a natural filter for dust which otherwise enters your apartment. There is also provision for the occupants to grow their own plants.

Automated Drip Irrigation:
An automated drip irrigation system has been incorporated throughout the building so that the gardens are maintained without the occupants having to water the plants. There will be a drip system instead of a sprinkler system which will save water.

Solar Panels:
Solar panels installed on the roof will provide enough energy to power the common amenities such as public and lobby lights, elevators, the grey water recycling system, the sewage recycling system and other public utilities. Any excess power will be sold to the electricity grid using a net metering system.

Rain Water Harvesting:
Rain water will be collected at ground level and used with recycled grey water for toilet flushing and plant irrigation.

Grey Water Recycling System:
One of the main uses of water in apartments is for flushing. In an effort to reduce the water usage, water will be collected from the apartment showers and bathroom sinks, running it through a recycling system which will process the water to be less than 10 BOD (Bio Oxygen demand) The recycled water is mixed with rain water and sent through to the bathroom flushes and is also used in the drip irrigation system (Which means Flushing and the drip irrigation system is free.

Solid Waste Recycling:
Occupants Solid waste (with the aid of the occupants) will be separated into glass, paper, plastic and metal on each floor in a garbage room (which will be negatively ventilated so the smells dont escape into the lift lobby). The trash will them be collected and sold to the relevant authorities. The money earned from this process will be used to maintain the building, once again cutting down on the cost of maintenance.

Solid Waste Recycling:
Occupants Solid waste (with the aid of the occupants) will be separated into glass, paper, plastic and metal on each floor in a garbage room (which will be negatively ventilated so the smells dont escape into the lift lobby). This includes ensuring a structure that survives the tests of time and has minimum impact on the adjacent environs, while concurrently providing a pleasant and secure home for owners. The designer's aim is to offer sophisticated urban living in a serene countryside setting, harking back to the days of yore when one could pluck fruits from the garden and learn firsthand about the birds and butterflies that would frequent it.

Clearpoint Residencies have built in processors which will reduce your carbon foot print and more importantly reduce the maintenance cost across the board. We believe that inhabiting this living tower will be more cost effective than any residence you have lived in before due to the carefully thought out additions that have been provided.

Windows & Terraces: 
One of the main reasons for heat gain within an apartment is the fact that all apartments in Sri Lanka have windows which are directly exposed to sunlight. To counter this effect, we have consciously designed our entire building with windows that do not receive direct sunlight. We achieve this by extending ordinary balconies into large format terraces. This, while providing the practical benefit of shade, will also provide the occupants with extra external entertainment space.

Air Conditioning:
Since the apartments will gain no heat due to direct exposure to sunlight, it was possible to reduce the size of the air conditioners, thus requiring less energy to cool the apartments. In addition, all apartments are cross ventilated for the purpose of cooling the inside naturally.

Planted Terraces:
Planting on the terraces give the building its unique look but there is a more practical reason for the planting. Plants have a natural tendency to absorb sound, both internally and externally. Plants provide shade, cooling the terraces and buffering radiant heat (heat that can reflect off the occupants terrace if the tiles heat up). Oxygen produced during the daytime means cleaner air, while leaves act as a natural filter for dust which otherwise enters your apartment. There is also provision for the occupants to grow their own plants.

Automated Drip Irrigation:

Solar Panels:
Solar panels installed on the roof will provide enough energy to power the common amenities such as public and lobby lights, elevators, the grey water recycling system, the sewage recycling system and other public utilities. In an effort to reduce the water usage, water will be collected from the apartment showers and bathroom sinks, running it through a recycling system which will process the water to be less than 10 BOD (Bio Oxygen demand) The recycled water is mixed with rain water and sent through to the bathroom flushes and is also used in the drip irrigation system (Which means Flushing and the drip irrigation system is free.

Solid Waste Recycling:
Occupants Solid waste (with the aid of the occupants) will be separated into glass, paper, plastic and metal on each floor in a garbage room (which will be negatively ventilated so the smells dont escape into the lift lobby). The trash will them be collected and sold to the relevant authorities. The money earned from this process will be used to maintain the building, once again cutting down on the cost of maintenance.

name_ta: ,   , 5784 sqft  - Perera Mawatha, Kotuwegoda, Rajagiriya, Sri Jayawardanapura Kotte
name_si: Sri Jayawardanapura Kotte, Rajagiriya
name: Luxurious 5 Bedroom Apartment for Sale
description:
All special features of the standard 3 bedroom unit plus two extra bedrooms with terrace and an optional swimming pool

Total area 5784 sqft

Covered area 3980 sqft

Terrace area 1195 sqft

Located on the boundary of Rajagiriya and Kotte, Clearpoint residences is within easy access of Central Colombo, yet separate from the hustle and bustle of the city.  The tranquil environs of Kotuwegoda, by the tributaries of the Diyawanna Lake, provide the perfect balance of urban living in harmony with nature in what was the capital city of the ancient Kingdom of Kotte.

This location is well served by supermarkets and shopping areas, whilst also having national and international schools in close proximity.  The Sri Jayawardenapura General Hospital, amongst other well-established clinics, is easily accessed from the Residencies.  Public libraries can also be found in neighbouring areas.

The newly rejuvenated Diyatha Uyana is just across the lake from Clearpoint, providing local entertainment, a weekly organic farm, and weekend markets, as well as a small aquarium.  This area is perfect for serene walks, with food outlets nearby and the Waters Edge Hotel in near proximity.

This includes ensuring a structure that survives the tests of time and has minimum impact on the adjacent environs, while concurrently providing a pleasant and secure home for owners. The designer's aim is to offer sophisticated urban living in a serene countryside setting, harking back to the days of yore when one could pluck fruits from the garden and learn firsthand about the birds and butterflies that would frequent it.

Clearpoint Residencies have built in processors which will reduce your carbon foot print and more importantly reduce the maintenance cost across the board. We believe that inhabiting this living tower will be more cost effective than any residence you have lived in before due to the carefully thought out additions that have been provided.

Windows & Terraces: 
One of the main reasons for heat gain within an apartment is the fact that all apartments in Sri Lanka have windows which are directly exposed to sunlight. To counter this effect, we have consciously designed our entire building with windows that do not receive direct sunlight. We achieve this by extending ordinary balconies into large format terraces. This, while providing the practical benefit of shade, will also provide the occupants with extra external entertainment space.

Air Conditioning:
Since the apartments will gain no heat due to direct exposure to sunlight, it was possible to reduce the size of the air conditioners, thus requiring less energy to cool the apartments. In addition, all apartments are cross ventilated for the purpose of cooling the inside naturally.

Planted Terraces:
Planting on the terraces give the building its unique look but there is a more practical reason for the planting. Plants have a natural tendency to absorb sound, both internally and externally. Plants provide shade, cooling the terraces and buffering radiant heat (heat that can reflect off the occupants terrace if the tiles heat up). Oxygen produced during the daytime means cleaner air, while leaves act as a natural filter for dust which otherwise enters your apartment. There is also provision for the occupants to grow their own plants.

Automated Drip Irrigation:
An automated drip irrigation system has been incorporated throughout the building so that the gardens are maintained without the occupants having to water the plants. There will be a drip system instead of a sprinkler system which will save water.

Solar Panels:
Solar panels installed on the roof will provide enough energy to power the common amenities such as public and lobby lights, elevators, the grey water recycling system, the sewage recycling system and other public utilities. Any excess power will be sold to the electricity grid using a net metering system.

Rain Water Harvesting:
Rain water will be collected at ground level and used with recycled grey water for toilet flushing and plant irrigation.

Grey Water Recycling System:
One of the main uses of water in apartments is for flushing. In an effort to reduce the water usage, water will be collected from the apartment showers and bathroom sinks, running it through a recycling system which will process the water to be less than 10 BOD (Bio Oxygen demand) The recycled water is mixed with rain water and sent through to the bathroom flushes and is also used in the drip irrigation system (Which means Flushing and the drip irrigation system is free.

Solid Waste Recycling:
Occupants Solid waste (with the aid of the occupants) will be separated into glass, paper, plastic and metal on each floor in a garbage room (which will be negatively ventilated so the smells dont escape into the lift lobby). The trash will them be collected and sold to the relevant authorities. The money earned from this process will be used to maintain the building, once again cutting down on the cost of maintenance.

name: Havelock City 4 Bed Rooms Higher Floor Apartment for Sale
description:
Its situated on 25 perches.
Its a two storied house approx 4000sqf and its 6 years old.
The house has 5 large bedrooms with ensuite washrooms. It also includes a study and a maids/ utility room with maids' toilet. It also has a seperate visitors toilet. Two rooms have a wooden loft.
All rooms have air conditioning.
The master bedroom had a seperate dressing room and has its own jacuzzi.
It also has a living room, dinning area and breakfast room and a living room upstairs.
Indoor and Outdoor kitchen available. Indoor kitchen comes with the fridge, oven, cooker and hob.
The garage has parking for two vehicles and has its own driver's room and washroom.
It comes with a 30x15feet Pool which has a jacuzzi in it.
The house has a beautiful garden with a summer hut and swing.
Solar hot water and three phase electricity is available.

name: A luxurious 3 bedrooms apartment  Unit A  for sale in Colombo 4
description:
Common Facilities:

-Roof Top Swimming Pool & Gym with a Function Area

-Visitors Lobby/Reception in the Ground Floor

-24 Hours Security

-Fire Protection System with Fire Extinguishers, Alarms, Hose Reels & Fire Exit

-Allocated Car Park in the Ground Floor/Basement for every Apartment

-High Speed Elevator (9 Passengers)

-Stand by Generator for the Common Area Lighting, Water & Fire Pumps

-Garbage Storage Area in the Ground Floor with the Trolleys for the Collection & Transfer to the Colombo Municipal Council Garbage Collection Trucks

-Prompt Maintenance


Common Features:

-Very Good Ventilation

-Good Access Road

-Safe Neighborhood

-Security & Peace of Mind compared to Living in an Individual House

-Very Close to Colombo City

-Close to Government, Private & International Schools/Educational Institutions

-Close to Government & Leading Private Hospitals/Medical Centers

-Easy Access to Super Markets, Banks, Recreational Centers, Hotels, Restaurants & all other Basic Amenities


Specifications:

-Imported Porcelain Tiles for the Floors, Ceramic Tiles for the Toilets & Pantry Walls

-Master Bed Room & Living/Dining are fitted with Air Conditioning Units

-All Bed Rooms & Living/Dining are fitted with KDK Ceiling Fans

-Provisions for Air Conditioning Units in all Bed Rooms

-Provisions for Telephone, ADSL & T.V. Sockets for Living/Dining & Master Bed Room

-Imported Light Fittings

-Main Entrance & Room Doors are fitted with Class 1 Timber

-Toilets are fitted with Water Proof PVC Doors

-Windows are made of Rust Proof Powder Coated Aluminum (Non- Corrosive)

-Mahogany Pantry Cupboards with Granite Top

-Provision for Washing Machine Connection

-Hot Water Geyser for all Toilets

-Intercom Facility from the Apartment to the Ground Floor Reception

-Separate Electricity & Water Meters for each Apartment

-Private Balconies in all Apartments

-Options for Wall Paints & Tiles

Payment Options:

Option 1
Attractive Discount for 100% Up Front Payment & Signing of the Agreement To Sell

Option 2  
List Price - Can be discussed & pay as per the below Interest Free Payment Plan 

Payment Plan:
Reservation - Rs.1,000,000/00 (Rs.1 Million)
Advance - 25% Within 2 Weeks & Signing of the Sales Agreement)
1st Installment - 10% (On Completion of the Foundation)
2nd Installment - 10% (On Completion of the 2nd Floor Slab)
3rd Installment - 10% (On Completion of the 4th Floor Slab)
4th Installment - 10% (On Completion of the 6th Floor Slab)
5th Installment - 10% (On Completion of the 8th Floor Slab)
6th Installment - 15% (On Completion of all the Masonry Work)
7th Installment - 10% (On Handing over of the Key)

description:
With sea views on both the north and west, the apartment shows grandeur luxury with its over sized living room and enables stylish living with its open kitchen along with the designs of the two master bedrooms, step in closet and separated maid room that brand your delicate living style.

This location also ensures that transportation to and from the citys amenities is effortless and consumes very limited time.

As Colombo 3 transforms into a modern-day metropolis with immense potential, Astoria is destined to be its flagship real estate project that manifests the mighty legacy of AVIC in Sri Lanka.

-Separate parking entrance for residents and visitors

name_si: Colombo 3 (Kollupitiya)
name: A luxurious 2 bedrooms apartment  Tower 2A  for sale in Kollupitiya
description:
With a northern sea view and an eastern city view, the apartment employs segregation on dynamic and static areas to protect master's privacy. In order to take full advantage of utility value and flexibility of the apartment design, the multi-functional study could also be merged with the master bedroom according to client's preference.

This location also ensures that transportation to and from the citys amenities is effortless and consumes very limited time.

As Colombo 3 transforms into a modern-day metropolis with immense potential, Astoria is destined to be its flagship real estate project that manifests the mighty legacy of AVIC in Sri Lanka.

-608 luxury fully air-conditioned apartments

-6 exclusive rooftop duplexes

-Lobby areas for each of the four towers

-Car park with 774 parking lots

-Open air swimming pool

-Rooftop garden

-Separate parking entrance for residents and visitors

-24 hour security

-Generator for electricity guarantee

-Intelligent Building system (IBS), Including site security, electronic patrolling, elevator management, visitor management intelligent light, intrusion alarm system, public broad cast and CATV system.

name_ta: Apartment in Nuwaraeliya Dimple Hills
name_si: sinhala
name: Apartment in Nuwaraeliya Dimple Hills
description:
Surrounded by lush greenery, Dimple Hills offers comfortable accommodation situated just a 5-minute drive from Nuwara Eliya Town and the famous Gregory Lake. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire property, while parking is provided at no charge.

Featuring a balcony and a separate living room, rooms are fitted with carpet flooring, heating facility, a wardrobe and sofa seating area. Includes a kitchen equipped with a stove, microwave and dining area. The en suite bathroom comes with shower.

Dimple Hills is a 5-minute drive to Nuwara Eliya Golf Club and a 15-minute drive to Hakgala Botanical Garden. Colombo City is accessible with a 4-hour and 30-minute drive, while Bandaranaike International Airport is 160 km away.

Sightseeing trips and day excursions can be made at the tour desk.

description:
Offering 5 Star' accommodation in Colombos city centre, The Monarch Apartment at Crescat City features a world chain of spa, outdoor pool and fitness facilities. It boasts dining options. Free parking is also provided. Wi-Fi is available for free throughout the property.

The Monarch Apartment is located in the heart of Colombo city within walking distance from famous Galle Face. It operates a 24-hour front desk and provides modern apartments with free Wi-Fi access.

The Monarch at Crescat City Apartment offers rooms with city views & direct ocean views and cable TV channels. Fully Furnished Room, Hall, Living Area, Dining , Kitchen amenities include tea and coffee-making facilities, an iron and safe. Attached bathrooms come with a bathtub and separate shower.

View, Telephone, DVD Player, Cable Channels, Flat-screen TV, Safety Deposit Box, Air Conditioning, Iron, Desk, Ironing Facilities, Seating Area, Carpeted, Sofa, Wardrobe/Closet, Shower, Bath, Hairdryer, Free toiletries, Toilet, Bathroom, Slippers, Minibar, Executive Lounge Access, Towels, Linen, Upper floors accessible by lift.

Free WiFi is available in all rooms & whole apartment.

Apartment size: 1450 Sq.ft

2 Bed Rooms & 2 Bathrooms

Bed Size(s): 1 Double bed, 1 extra-large double bed.

A stroll from Crestcat Boulevard Shopping Mall, the apartment is approximately 2 km from Colombo Townhall and Sri Lanka National Museum. Colombo International Airport is 28 km away.

listing_address: Ascon Residencies in Base Line Road
description:
Apartment, situated at Ascon Residencies in Base Line Road near Borella in the Colombo city.

The spacious apartment comes fully equipped for all your needs, with a lovely living area with dining table to seat six. HD flat TV, fully fitted kitchen, Intercom phone, 2 bathrooms with hot/cold shower. Additional bath room is also available. From the balcony you can enjoy the magnificent views from high above the city.
The master double bedroom with lots of wardrobe space, queen size bed and en suite bathroom , further bedroom with two single beds and wardrobes and bathroom with shower area.   

Location and Address
Distances from the apartment to the Airport: 34 km say 30 minutes drive.
Lanka Hospitals, Asiri Hospital New House of Fashions many super markets and shops in the same road 

Facilities:
General: linen, towels and paper towels provided 
Outside: terrace, furniture,4 lifts , pool and equipped gym
Air conditioning, fans, washing machine, iron, ironing board washing machine 
Kitchen: 4 burner cooker, fridge, microwave, , Electric kettle, oven, rice cooker 
Security: 24 Hour security, CCTV system
Covered car parking
Weekly cleaning and change of linen.
MINIMUM 3 DAYS bookings
Refundable Deposit US$ 200

name: Emerald Tower "The Tulip Apartment" , Nugegoda for sale
description: This apartment is situated in working distance to the Nugegoda Super Market and other important places in Nugegoda town. And it is situated off Chapel Road. This Emerald Tower Apartment completed in 9 floor and this apartment situated in 5th floor.. This apartment is the biggest apartment in the complex and it has been amalgamated with a part of adjoining apartment and made up to 1576Sq Ft,. And this apartment has its Swimming pool, Kiddies Pool and Gymnasium and other all amenities which is necessary to the modern world. Also remarkable 360 Degree view of entire Colombo City from the roof top party area. Obtain National Award 2009 for this apartment complex.

Only a stones throw away from the seaside,
this 2 bedroom apartment in Colombo 6 is the perfect accommodation for your getaway in Colombo.

name_ta: A NEWLY BUILT TWO BED ROOMED LUXURY APARTMENT SITUATED AT CLARA TOWERS-AINTREE STREET (OFF ASCOT AVENUE)-COLOMBO-05-FOR RENT (SHORT OR LONG TERM)
name_si: A NEWLY BUILT TWO BED ROOMED LUXURY APARTMENT SITUATED AT CLARA TOWERS-AINTREE STREET (OFF ASCOT AVENUE)-COLOMBO-05-FOR RENT (SHORT OR LONG TERM)
name: A NEWLY BUILT TWO BED ROOMED LUXURY APARTMENT SITUATED AT CLARA TOWERS-AINTREE STREET (OFF ASCOT AVENUE)-COLOMBO-05-FOR RENT (SHORT OR LONG TERM)
agency_address: No. 108, Asoka Mawatha, Sirimal Uyana, Ratmalana
description:
LOCATION
This apartment is situated in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured convenient location down a private road off Ascot avenue (close to the Thimbirigasyaya & the Jawatte roads) & is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, leading International as well as local schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship ,the post office etc.etc, it is is only about fifteen minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location.

DESCRIPTION
It is a two bed roomed luxury & spacious apartment & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, two bed rooms including a spacious master bed room, both with attached bathrooms, an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards & four balcony areas including a front balcony with a magnificent view of the city.

FACILITIES
The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with two air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for rest of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer doors are fitted with powder coated Aluminum frames, the sitting & dinning room areas are fitted with imported light fittings & consists of a door video phone, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware.

The apartment is elegantly furnished with quality new furniture & equipped with all electrical appliances.

The building consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, one lift with a standby generator, a common roof top terrace & a gym area, parking facilities & regular maintenance & garbage disposal services etc.etc.

SUITABLE FOR
Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

Rent Price:
USD.70/- per day (short term)
USD.1750/- per month (long term-over one month)

(Rate includes electricity, water, local calls & Wi fi)

name_ta: 24 Apartment on Edmond Residencies,Edvered Avenue, Havelock Town, Colombo 6
name_si: 24 Apartment on Edmond Residencies,Edvered Avenue, Havelock Town, Colombo 6
name: 24 Apartment on Edmond Residencies,Edvered Avenue, Havelock Town, Colombo 6
description:
FUTURE INVESTMENT WITH LUXURY LIFESTYLE
The Apartment newest residential condominium project "EDMOND RESIDENCIES" has launched at Edward Avenue, Havelock Road I n Colombo. The new project will cater uniquely designed modern architecture apartments which are fully luxury with sophistication and elegance blend in tranquility at an elite residential neighborhood in the heart of Colombo.
"EDMOND RESIDENCIES" is a 8 story 24 units condominium with a roof top swimming pool is a unique feature. The completion of this project is scheduled on November 2015 and ready for occupancy as per timelines. Each apartment comprises of 3 to 4 spacious elegant Bedrooms, Living room, Pantry, Dining room and Servant room are spacious for a comfortable living for you & your family. Every apartment has its own private balconies and can be enjoyed the mesmerizing panoramic City views.
The exclusivity of the location is that Edmond Residencies is facing entrance from Havelock Road (Opposite to Havelock City Adjoining with the IOC Fuel Station 30 Foot Wide Private Road) for easy & fast access to your apartments. Havelock Road commonly known as "Havelock Town" which is famous for an elite residential neighborhood in Colombo. The location itself centralized with exquisite facilities such as Posh Restaurants, High-rise Condominium Commercial Offices, Local & Foreign Banks, Popular Private and Public Schools & Educational Universities, State-of-the-art Classy Hospitals, Clubs, Karaoke Clubs etc. If you commit now the price escalation will not effect you.....! Go to the images you will fin more features which will attract you.very much.

name_ta: BRAND NEW 3Bed room luxury apartment 1400sq.ft,fully furnished at Havelock City 16th floor
name_si: BRAND NEW 3Bed room luxury apartment 1400sq.ft,fully furnished at Havelock City 16th floor
name: BRAND NEW 3Bed room luxury apartment 1400sq.ft,fully furnished at Havelock City 16th floor
description:
BRAND NEW 3Broom luxury apartment 1400sq.ft,f/furnished at Havelock City 16th floor sale.FACING TO THE GARDEN

BRAND NEW 3 bedroom apartment 1400sq.ft ,2 toilets,fully furnished ,maids room at Havelock City 16th floor. Beautiful City view Master bedroom with attached bathroom, living area, guest bedroom, Kitchen with fridge and 4 cookers Washing machine Beautifully furnished Manhattan Style, fully air conditioned and in brand new condition. TV with DVD player, 6 seat dining table Maids room and bathroom 24 hour security Basement car park

A three bedroom, luxurious apartment in the most prestigious condominium complex, Havelock City is available for sale.
The apartment is centrally located in the heart of the city of Colombo, offering easy access to various parts of the city using multiple access points. The guests can enjoy few of the famous Western, Chinese and Indian restaurants, supermarkets, bus and taxi stations as well as schools and many more. The well secured condominium provides 24 hour security, using state of the art security systems. The high-tech generator system ensures uninterrupted 24 hour power supply. The beautiful landscaped garden with jogging and cycling tracks provides ultimate relaxation. The fully air-conditioned apartment is equipped with luxury, modern state of the art furniture , home appliances, which gives the guests a truly remarkable experience. The spectacular view of the Colombo city and the sea from the 17th floor apartment terrace provides the guests, once in a life-time experience in at most relaxation. The apartment is supplied with cutlery, crockery , cooking utensils , linen AND HOT & COLD DRINKING WATER for guests convenience.
