name_ta: (ref no. 2138) A THREE BED ROOMED FULLY FURNISHED LUXURY APARTMENT AT CINNAMON GARDEN RESIDENCIES-WARD PLACE-COLOMBO-07-FOR LEASE
name_si: (ref no. 2138) A THREE BED ROOMED FULLY FURNISHED LUXURY APARTMENT AT CINNAMON GARDEN RESIDENCIES-WARD PLACE-COLOMBO-07-FOR LEASE
name: (ref no. 2138) A THREE BED ROOMED FULLY FURNISHED LUXURY APARTMENT AT CINNAMON GARDEN RESIDENCIES-WARD PLACE-COLOMBO-07-FOR LEASE
agency_address: No. 108, Asoka Mawatha, Sirimal Uyana, Ratmalana
description:
LOCATION

This apartment is situated in one of the best residential areas in Colombo in a well secured & convenient location situated with close proximity to the town hall ,also to supermarkets, leading International & local schools,to the National hospital & other private medical institutions, banks, places of worship, the post office, Govt. As well as commercial establishments, several diplomatic missions etc.etc, it is only about five minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & round Colombo & the suburbs, from this location.



DESCRIPTION

It is a three bed roomed luxury & spacious apartment situated on the second floor of the building & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, another common bathroom, a utility room, an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards, a maids room with a separate toilet & four balcony areas.



FACILITIES

The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with four air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for all of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer doors are fitted with Powder coated Aluminum frames, the sitting & dinning room areas are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of an shower cubical for the common bathroom & a bathtub for the attached bathroom.The apartment is elegantly furnished with quality new furniture & equipped with all electrical appliances.

The building consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, a swimming pool with a separate baby pool, a gym, parking facilities, regular maintenance & garbage disposal facilities etc.etc.



SUITABLE FOR

Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

(ref no. 2138)

name_ta: BRAND NEW THREE BEDROOM LUXURY APARTMENT FOR IMMEDIATE RENT AT DEHIWELA
name_si: BRAND NEW THREE BEDROOM LUXURY APARTMENT FOR IMMEDIATE RENT AT DEHIWELA
name: BRAND NEW THREE BEDROOM LUXURY APARTMENT FOR IMMEDIATE RENT AT DEHIWELA
description:
Marine City Residencies is one of the exclusive apartment complexes in the border of Colombo City. This recently constructed apartment complex has a spectacular 360 view of the Indian Ocean and the City of Colombo from its roof top and pool area. The complex is equipped with a Supermarket, Hair Salon, Restaurant, Laundry, etc.

This brand new apartment which is on offer consists of 3 bed rooms with 2 toilets, Living & Dinning area, Balconies, Pantry, Store room and Maids toilet in a 1435 sq.ft. floor area. It is fully furnished with elegant furniture from E.H. Cooray, fully air conditioned, and fully equipped with all luxury facilities.

The Lounge is equipped with a 32 LED TV and cable TV for your viewing pleasure.

Master bedroom with king size bed, 8 mattress, two pillows, one bed side cupboard, wardrobe, dressing table with mirror.

Second bedroom with king size bed, 6 mattress, two pillows, one bedside cupboard, wardrobe, dressing table with mirror.

Third bedroom with queen size bed, 6 mattress, wardrobe, dressing table with mirror.

Pantry with Gas stove, Microwave Oven, Electric Kettle, Refrigerator, Pop-up Toaster, Rice Cooker.

The apartment offers a direct view of the beautiful ocean and is just walking distance to the beach. Close proximity to shopping malls, supermarkets, hotels, restaurants, banks, bus stand, train station, etc.

name_si: (2144A) Rathmalana, Mount Lavinia  ,
name: *code no.2144A)) A LUXURY AND SPACIOUS THREE BED ROOMED APARTMENT ON THE FIFTH FLOOR AT TEMPLAR'S ROAD-MOUNT LAVINIA-FOR SALE
description:
LOCATION
This building is situated in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential as well as commercial & well secured convenient location close to the Galle road & the Mt.lavinia junction, down Templar's road & is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, St.Thomses college & other leading local as well as International schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office, the railway station, the Mt.Lavinia hotel & several other beach resorts & restaurants etc.etc, it is only about half hours drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location.

DESCRIPTION
This apartment is situated on the 5 th floor of a newly built luxury apartment complex & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, another common bathroom, an elegant pantry with fitted cupboards, a maids toilet, three balcony areas including two front balconies with a magnificent city & sea view & an enclosed balcony area which could be uses as a utility room.


FACILITIES
The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with four air conditioners & fitted ceiling fans for all of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, the sitting & dinning room areas are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of individual shower cubicles & vanity basins.

The building consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, a common roof top terrace area with a function hall & a magnificent view of the city & the sea, a gym, parking facilities, one lift with a standby generator for the common areas, regular maintenance & garbage disposal facilities etc.etc.

Deeds available for this apartment

name_si: (RAI4) Rathmalana, Mount Lavinia  ,
name: (*Code no.2142) FULLY FURNISHED HOME STAY LUXURY APARTMENTS, ROOMS & SUITES FOR RENT AT MOUNT-LAVINIA
description:
LOCATION
This newly built luxury apartment complex (with only six apartments ) is situated in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential as well as commercial & well secured convenient location close to the Mount Lavinia Junction, the Galle Road and the beach, down Station road & is situated within close proximity to supermarkets, St. Thomass College as well as other leading local and International Schools. Its central location facilitates easy accessibility to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc. and is only about twenty minutes drive to the City of Colombo.

DESCRIPTION
The building consists of three (2 bed roomed) apartments & three (3 bed roomed apartments), also two (single bed) rooms, a two bed suite & a three bed suite. The apartments & the rooms are elegantly furnished and are clean and comfortable. .

The apartments have fully equipped elegant kitchenettes complete with refrigerators, a gas cooker and hob, microwave oven and many other accessories on request.

FACILITIES
All of the apartments & the rooms have three phase electricity supply with fitted air conditioners as well as ceiling fans, pipe borne hot and cold water supply, Free Wi-Fi & cable TV facilities. For relaxation - there is a common roof top terrace area with a panoramic view of the Indian Ocean, the City of Colombo and the surroundings of Mount Lavinia.

DESCRIPTION & PRICING
2 PERSONS

DELUXE SINGLE BEDROOM USD 55 LKR 7,150/=
A single room with a Queen Size Bed, attached large toilet with Bath Tub and shower cubicle with hot and cold water, air-conditioning, ceiling fan, etc. LED Flat television includes cable network and FREE Wi-Fi, mini fridge, compact sitting and balcony

SUPERIOR STUDIO SUITE USD 69 LKR 8,970/=
A single room with a Queen Size Bed, attached large toilet with shower cubicle, hot and cold water, air-conditioning, ceiling fan, etc. A separate attached compact sitting room includes LED Flat television, cable network, mini fridge and FREE Wi-Fi

PREMIER ONE BEDROOM APARTMENT USD 75 LKR 9,750/=
A single room with a Queen Size Bed and attached toilet, shower cubicle with hot and cold water, air-conditioning, ceiling fans, etc. Part of a complete Apartment with large sitting with balconies and dining area. LED Flat television includes cable network and FREE Wi-Fi. A fully equipped kitchenette with a refrigerator, microwave cooker, gas hob and oven toaster, blender, iron and iron board and many more on request.

4 PERSONS

PREMIER 2 X QUEEN BED SUITE USD 69 LKR 8,970/=
A very large single room with an excellent view of the west coast and Indian Ocean and two (02) Queen Size Beds and attached toilet with shower cubicle, hot and cold water, air-conditioning, ceiling fans, washing machine, etc. LED Flat television includes cable network and FREE Wi-Fi. Compact sitting and Dining area with balcony and kitchenette equipped with a refrigerator, microwave cooker, gas hob and oven toaster, blender, iron and iron board and many more on request.

2 BEDROOM APARTMENT USD 99 LKR 12,870/=
A two (02) Bedroom fully furnished Apartment with a Queen Size Bed in Master Bedroom and attached toilet and the second room with a single bed with adjacent toilet. Both toilets comprise of shower cubicles, etc with hot and cold water. The Apartment is fully air-conditioned with ceiling fans. A well laid out sitting and dining area includes LED Flat television with cable network and FREE Wi-Fi. A kitchenette equipped with a refrigerator, microwave cooker, gas hob and oven and accessories such as toaster, blender, iron and iron board and many more on request

6 PERSONS

3 BED SUITE WITH JACUZZI USD 99 LKR 12,870/=
An extremely large semi-detached room with an excellent view of the west coast and Indian Ocean comprising of one (01) King Size Bed and two (02) Queen Size Beds. A very large attached toilet with shower cubicle, Jacuzzi, vanity washes basins, hot and cold water. A compact sitting and dining area with balcony - comfortably accommodates the 6 in-house guests with air-conditioning, ceiling fans, LED Flat television which includes cable network and FREE Wi-Fi. The suite is also equipped with a refrigerator and microwave cooker. Iron and iron board and many more on request.

3 BEDROOM APARTMENT USD 120 LKR 15,600/=
A three (03) Bedroom fully furnished Apartment with a Queen Size Bed in Master Bedroom with attached toilet and the second and third bedroom with single beds with adjacent common toilet. Both toilets comprise of a shower cubicles, etc. with hot and cold water. The Apartment is fully air-conditioning and with ceiling fans. A well laid out sitting and dining area includes LED Flat television with cable network and FREE Wi-Fi. A kitchenette equipped with a refrigerator, microwave cooker, gas hob and oven and accessories such as toaster, blender, iron and iron board and many more on request

8 PERSONS

4 BEDROOM VILLA WITH GRADEN USD 160 LKR 20,800/=
A four (04) Bedroom Apartment with Queen Size Bed in all Bedrooms with attached toilets. All toilets comprise of a shower cubicle, etc with hot and cold water. All bedrooms are air-conditioning and with ceiling fans. A well laid out sitting and dining area includes LED Flat television with cable network and FREE Wi-Fi. A kitchenette equipped with a refrigerator, microwave cooker, gas hob and oven and accessories such as toaster, blender, iron and iron board and many more on request. A well laid out landscaped garden completes a home away from home

RATES QUOTED ABOVE ARE ALL INCLUSIVE NET PRICES PER DAY

FACILITIES:
PARKING, LIFT AND ROOF TOP TERRACE WITH A PANORAMIC VIEW OF THE CITY OF COLOMBO AND SURROUNDINGS

TERMS & CONDITIONS HOLIDAY & SHORT TERM RENTAL

l BOOKING FEE IS REQUIRED IN ADVANCE BASED ON PERIOD OF STAY
l CANCELLATION WITHIN 7 DAYS OF BOOKING DATE OR NO SHOW WILL IMPOSE FULL PAYMENT
l PAYMENT IN FULL FOR BOOKING PERIOD ON DAY OF OCCUPATION - IF NOT PAID PRIOR
l EXTENSION OF STAY SHOULD BE NOTIFIED IN ADVANCE AND WILL BE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY
l CHECK IN CHECK OUT TIMES: 12.00 HOURS CHECK OUT TIME: 14.00 HOURS
l LAKE CHECKOUT WILL LEVY 50% OF ROOM CHARGES
l LINEN IS PROVIDED AND WILL BE CHANGED TWICE WEEKLY
l BASIC CUTLERY, CROCKERY AND UTENSILS WILL BE PROVIDED INCLUDING GAS
l OTHER REQUESTS ARE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY

PRIME HIGHLIGHTS:

CENTRALLY LOCATED AND WALKING DISTANCE TO:

Mt.Lavinia Beach Restaurants Supermarkets Shopping Take-away outlets Post office Bank /ATMs Bus-stop Railway station Taxi stand City centre Places of Worship

description:
We offer 1-Bed, 2-Bed and 3-Bed Apartments in the 5 Star Super Luxury Crescat Residencies, Empire, Monarch, onThree20.

This is one of Sri Lanka's true 5 star apartment buildings centrally located in the heart of Colombo, in the Cinnamon Grand hotel complex close to Galle Face Green. Ideal accommodation for your vacation or business trip.

Our apartments are fully furnished, clean, bright, fully air conditioned and are in outstanding condition.

Our apartments are in a self contained environment that caters to our tenants every need.


Every apartment include the following:
Air conditioning
Queen / King size beds
WiFi high speed Internet
Fully automatic washing machine
LCD Cable TV
Hot water
Bath room shower cubicles
A tub in the master bath room
Toiletries
Complete kitchenette

RCC Columns, Beams, Slabs, 9" thick cement brick walls at outer perimeter and 4.5" thick cement brick walls to satisfy the design requirement

Roof & Ceiling
Asbestos free fibre cement roofing sheets and suspension ceiling.

Finishes
Living,Dining,Varandahs,Balconies and Bed Rooms
To be laid with non slippery 12" ' 12" porcelain floor tiles as per architect's advice.

Stair case
Ordinary cement rendered with color pigments.

Toilets
Floor
Non slippery ceramic tiles laid, surface shall be water proofed.

Walls
Laid with ceramic or porcelain tiles up to a height of Sit in shower area and 4ft in other areas, above tile level shall be plastered and painted with CIC or equivalent approved quality paint.

Wall Finishes
Smooth plaster on inside walls and apply one coat of wall putty, 2 coats of emulsion paint (CIC or equivalent) semi - rough plaster on external walls and apply wall filler, 2 coats of weather shield paint (CIC or equivalent)

Plumbing Work
Bathroom fittings
All bathroom fittings shall be "Ouravit" or equivalent in white and accessories shall be "American Standard" or equivalent commode with cistern, wash basin and shower rose, Mirror, soap tray. hand bidet shower, toilet paper holder and towel rack shall be fixed in the bathroom.

Doors and Windows
Front Verandah - Mahogany sash and Red Balaw or similar wood shall be used.
internal Doors - Plywood sash and Aluminium frames.
Windows o Bronze Aluminium or Powder coated.
Fan lights - Bronze Aluminium or Powder coated.
Locks ~ "Mortise" or equalant door lock with a handle for front door and verandah
(Union or equivalent) All other door locks to be knob type.

Stair case hand rail
Steel and timber mixed as per Architect's directions.

Water Supply
UPVC cold pipe network via a common water tank places above the buildings. Supply to underground sump from National Water Supply Board and pump to the overhead tank inside the complex.

Strom water drainage
ZineAlum gutter and down pipes fixed to roof and surface drain system with manholes

Colour Scheme - As directed by the Architect

Lift - Uft shall be provided for each building consists of ten housing units.

General - Garden area to be leveled and turfed separate electricity and water meters tobe provided for each housing unit. parking slot for each house is allocated.

24 hour controlled security at the gate and every entry will be monitered.

Gymnasium and Swimming pool.

name_ta: (ref no. 2147)   ,   ,  - Nugegoda, Sri Jayawardanapura Kotte
name_si: (ref no. 2147) Sri Jayawardanapura Kotte, Nugegoda  ,
name: (ref no. 2147) THREE BED ROOMED LUXURY APARTMENTS FOR LEASE AT NELUM COURTS-KANDEWATTE ROAD-NUGEGODA
agency_address: No. 108, Asoka Mawatha, Sirimal Uyana, Ratmalana
description:
LOCATION

These apartments are available in a newly built luxury apartment complex situated down Kandewatte road in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured location close to the Nugegoda junction & close to Nawala & is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, schools, hospitals, banks, places of worship & the post office,it is only about twenty minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs from this location.

DESCRIPTION

It is a four storied newly built condominium which consists of four,three bed roomed apartments on each floor, each apartment consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, another common bathroom, an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards & two balcony areas each.

FACILITIES

All of the apartments are fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with three air conditioners for each apt, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer windows are made using powder coated Aluminum frames, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware.
The apartments could be furnished if required

The building consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, a lift & a standby generator, inter com facilities for each apt, parking facilities, a common roof top terrace area with a magnificent view, regular maintenance & garbage disposal services etc.etc.

SUITABLE FOR

Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

description_si: Sri Jayawardanapura Kotte, Nugegoda,

name_ta: ,   , 1161 sqft  - Temple Road, Nawala, Sri Jayawardanapura Kotte
name_si: Sri Jayawardanapura Kotte, Temple Road, Nawala  ,
name: Dream Prime Lake Apartments For sale in Nawala (Type H-1)
description:
Prime Residencies Temple Road-Nawala is the most exciting latest upcoming condominium project by Prime Homes (Pvt) Ltd.

Nawala is a Suburb of Colombo near Rajagiriya, within the Kotte municipality in the western province of Sri Lanka. An up-market residential area, Nawala lies between the Commercial Capital Colombo and the Administrative Capital of Kotte. Today Nawala is a cosmopolitan town encompassing all facilities. Supermarkets, restaurants, banks, fuel stations, book shops, grocery shops, hardware shops and many retailers of upmarket brands have made Nawala a landmark town.

 Prime Residencies Temple Road-Nawala designed with eleven stories  &  few units overlooking the Diyawanna oya Canal and comprise  of 60  apartment units with 2 bedrooms & 3 bedrooms. Unit sizes range from 890sqft to 1246sqft. Ground floor, First floor & Second floor will be allocated for Car parking area.

 This enclosed complex has 24 hour security, large swimming pool, fully equipped gymnasium and a roof terrace with a panoramic vista. Generator for common areas, two spacious lifts, emergency lighting, covered parking. Type H-3 & H-4 are facing the canal. Type H-6 & H-1 are facing temple road.

Type H1

description_ta:
Prime Residencies Temple Road-Nawala is the most exciting latest upcoming condominium project by Prime Homes (Pvt) Ltd.

Nawala is a Suburb of Colombo near Rajagiriya, within the Kotte municipality in the western province of Sri Lanka. An up-market residential area, Nawala lies between the Commercial Capital Colombo and the Administrative Capital of Kotte. Today Nawala is a cosmopolitan town encompassing all facilities. Supermarkets, restaurants, banks, fuel stations, book shops, grocery shops, hardware shops and many retailers of upmarket brands have made Nawala a landmark town.

 Prime Residencies Temple Road-Nawala designed with eleven stories  &  few units overlooking the Diyawanna oya Canal and comprise  of 60  apartment units with 2 bedrooms & 3 bedrooms. Unit sizes range from 890sqft to 1246sqft. Ground floor, First floor & Second floor will be allocated for Car parking area.

 This enclosed complex has 24 hour security, large swimming pool, fully equipped gymnasium and a roof terrace with a panoramic vista. Generator for common areas, two spacious lifts, emergency lighting, covered parking. Type H-3 & H-4 are facing the canal. Type H-6 & H-1 are facing temple road.


Type H-6

name_si: A THREE BED ROOM MASTER PIECE COLONIAL STYLE APARTMENT ON THE TOP FLOOR OF A TWO STOREY OLD MANSION KNOWN AS "THE RETREAT" FOR RENT
name: A THREE BED ROOM MASTER PIECE COLONIAL STYLE APARTMENT ON THE TOP FLOOR OF A TWO STOREY OLD MANSION KNOWN AS "THE RETREAT" FOR RENT
agency_address: No. 108, Asoka Mawatha, Sirimal Uyana, Ratmalana
description:
Ref No: 2150A

Short Term Accommodation

LOCATION

This apartment is situated in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured convenient location, down Retreat Road, Colombo 4. close proximity to supermarkets, banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc. etc, it is only about ten minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location.

DESCRIPTION

The "Retreat-Condo" is delightfully spacious, homing to 02 air conditioned large bed rooms,03 well furnished bathrooms, capacious sitting & dinning area and outdoor parking for two vehicles. The convenience not only lies within the premises, but also the location itself is strategically picked, so that you are seconds away from revered places of religious worship, variety of gastronomic delights, places of entertainment and diversity of malls to let lose the shopoholic within you.

* 02 Spacious Bedrooms with AC and attached bathroom. One of the bathrooms has exclusive as well as common access.
*Servants quarters with an attached bathroom. This can be used as another bedroom/utility room etc, and is independent from the main unit.
*Kitchen and pantry
*Clean bed linen and towels will be provided
*Cutlery provided for max stay for 8 persons
*Self catering basis. Large cooker with oven/microwave. ( fully loaded kitchen)
*Garage for 1 vehicle with brand new remote controlled roller shutter
*Large sit out sea view terrace.
* services provided 3 times a week.

** Very tastefully furnished with the owners collection of original Antique furniture.

agency_address: No. 108, Asoka Mawatha, Sirimal Uyana, Ratmalana
description:
Ref No: 2150B

This building is situated in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential as well as highly commercialized & well secured centralized convenient location close to the Galle road & the Marine drive with wide access roadways from either side & is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, leading International & local schools,to hospitals, banks, places of worship, the post office, the railway station etc.etc, it is only about ten minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location. The property is known as HALAHOUSE COLOMBO

DESCRIPTION
It is a nice private cosy 4 stories building conveniently located by the Galle road (with access to the Marine drive & with a wide road with ample parking). A total of 4 apartments

1Floor - 2 bed/ 3 Bathrooms/laundry room.

2 Floor 3 bed and 3 bathrooms. 1 Room is small

3 floor - very spaciously laid out, 2 bed room/ 2 bathrooms

4 floor - The Flagship penthouse apartment of Halahouse Colombo

It is all about Luxury at Hala house Colombo. Italian marble floors/ and high quality porcelain floors/ luxury toilet fittings/ Large size TV's/Ipod docks/Wireless Internet and very tastefully furnished for practical living.

The building consists of a lift & separate stairways.

24/7 Backup generator

24/7 Caretaker and Access card controlled main entrance to building. CCTV cameras.

Well read library

Gym with lovely sea view

Bicycles for Tenants use for

Own Tuk Tuk and Trustworthy driver to take you places and do your errands.

Contract with Medicalls for medical emergencies

Complimentary refreshments trays in all apartments

Service provided 2 times a week, and frequency could be increased on demand.

name_ta: 'TRILLIUM 07' is for your Taking.. Book yours NOW (Only 09 More units)..
name_si: 'TRILLIUM 07' is for your Taking.. Book yours NOW (Only 09 More units)..
name: 'TRILLIUM 07' is for your Taking.. Book yours NOW (Only 09 More units)..
description:
Were you let down when Trillium Apartments were sold out? Ever searched for an Apartment, but couldn't find one in a prestigious location?

NO MORE REGRETS. Trillium Property Management is to unveil yet another iconic Apartment that's to be constructed at Torrington Avenue in Colombo- 07.

'TRILLIUM 07' will be situated in the epicenter of Colombo's most residential and plush neighbourhood of Torrington Avenue in Colombo- 07, and to be situated withing close proximity to all daily accesses while remaining with a tranquil environment.

Built on just 05 tiers with a living space of 1570- 1710 Sq. Ft, and consisting of 20 units (02 Penthouses included) of 03 Bedroom Apartments with all modern, and luxury amenities (Rooftop Swimming Pool, Gymnasium, Rooftop Terrace), these Apartments are sure to raise the bar of 'Luxury Lifestyle' living. Idealistic for investment purposes as well.
Expecting for completion, and occupancy by December 2015.

CALL NOW FOR FURTHER DETAILS AND BOOKINGS. A GUARANTEED 10% RETURN ON INVESTMENT FOR EARLY BOOKINGS.. (Ready for occupation by June 2016)..

name_ta: Apartment for rent in colombo
name_si: Apartment for rent in colombo
name: Apartment for rent in colombo
description:
Family apartment , conveniently located in Colombo 4. Access to popular shopping arcades, international and local restaurants, with walking distance to the Beach..

Bed room is spacious, air-conditioned as an extra option , with a Queen Sized carved solid wood bed. Two to 3 additional single beds/mattresses . fitted at a nominal extra.
Bath room is a large detached unit, with the comfort of pressurized hot shower.

Lounge area is a spacious 75 sq meters and solely for guest use. Refrigeration and cooking facilities provided.

Wi-Fi, internet access and a fax is available as an extra.

Electricity is an extra.

Cottage 26 provides a western breakfast or Sri Lankan, at an extra of $ 8/-per person. Kitchen facilities including refrigerator is provided.

Take away meal options from Pizza Hut,Mc Donalds, KFC in addition to Thai,Indian,Japanese and Sri Lankan foods are at easy reach.

The Two Bedroom Apartment is an extremely nice fully furnished flat with large living room, separate w/c - fully fitted Kitchen, stairs leading down to a very quiet extremely large master bedroom (super king size bed) and the second bedroom a small double, with a full bathroom. name_ta: Fully Furnished and Air Conditioned 3 Bed Room Apartment for Rent off Flower Road, Colombo 7
name_si: Fully Furnished and Air Conditioned 3 Bed Room Apartment for Rent off Flower Road, Colombo 7
name: Fully Furnished and Air Conditioned 3 Bed Room Apartment for Rent off Flower Road, Colombo 7
description:
The apartment is located off Flower Road, Colombo 7 in a very quiet lane. There are 3 BRs, 3 Bath/toilets (one bath has a tub and the other 2 baths only showers), Lounge, dining cum pantry, balconies. The apartment is air conditioned and has hot and cold water. The area is prestigious and has diplomatic missions and is in a high security zone. Cinnamon Red (hotel), Peach valley Restaurant, Mango Tree Restaurant and Commons Cafe is within 150 meters of the apartment. Race Course, Independence Arcade, Lionel Wendt, Mueseum, Liberty Plaza, Cinnamon Grand Hotel, Odel, Vihara Maha Devi Park, Nelum Pokuna, SSC etc are walking distance. The apartment is located on the 3rd floor. Main house is on the 1st (Ground) and 2nd floors. Owners are brother, sister and sisters husband.

They occupy the 1st (Ground) and 2nd floors and live mostly overseas. 4th Floor is the Roof Top and also houses the water tanks and pressure pumps. The prospective tenant can use the roof top. The apartment is only 5 years old and was occupied by a Japanese Consultant for the last 5 years, who left Sri Lanka in December 2015.

The furnishings include all furniture, curtains, washer, cooker/oven, fridge/freezer, dish washer, TV, micro wave, kettle etc. The apartment and all furnishings are in excellent condition. The neighbourhood is excellent.

name_ta: 4 Bedroom Luxury Apaprtment at Havelock City< Colomb 6
name_si: 4 Bedroom Luxury Apaprtment at Havelock City< Colomb 6
name: 4 Bedroom Luxury Apaprtment at Havelock City< Colomb 6
listing_address: Havelock City, Off Havelock Road, Colombo 6
description:
A FOUR BED ROOMED LUXURY APARTMENT (FULLY FURNISHED) AT PARK TOWER (WITH CLOSE GARDEN VIEW)-HAVELOCK CITY-FOR LEASE

LOCATION
This luxury apartments is situated in a tranquil & peaceful well secured convenient location & is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, shopping malls (in the near future a shopping mall will be operational in the complex as well), leading International & local schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc.etc ,it is only about fifteen minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location.

DESCRIPTION
This apartment is situated on the forth floor of the park tower building at Havelock city residencies, with a close garden view which is on the second floor (the building is mostly occupied by diplomatic personal from several embassies) & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, four bed rooms including a spacious master bed room two attached bathrooms, a common bathroom, an elegant & spacious pantry area with fitted cupboards & a service entrance, a utility room, a maids room with a separate toilet & two balcony areas with a magnificent view.

FACILITIES
The apartment consists of wooden & tiled flooring, has three phase electricity supply with six air conditioners & a fitted ceiling fan for the sitting room, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer doors are fitted with Powder coated Aluminium frames, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of of individual shower cubicles, the apartment is elegantly furnished with quality furniture & equipped with all electrical appliances plus cookery & cutlery as well.
The complex consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, parking lots, a common large landscaped garden area, a large fish pond, a gym, two lifts & a standby generator ( a club house with swimming pool ,a day care, a gym,a function hall, a restaurant,a table tennis,squash etc)

SUITABLE FOR
Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

This luxury apartments is situated in a tranquil & peaceful well secured convenient location & is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, shopping malls (in the near future a shopping mall will be operational in the complex as well), leading International & local schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc.etc ,it is only about fifteen minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location.

DESCRIPTION
This apartment is situated on the forth floor of the park tower building at Havelock city residencies, with a close garden view which is on the second floor (the building is mostly occupied by diplomatic personal from several embassies) & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, four bed rooms including a spacious master bed room two attached bathrooms, a common bathroom, an elegant & spacious pantry area with fitted cupboards & a service entrance, a utility room, a maids room with a separate toilet & two balcony areas with a magnificent view.

FACILITIES
The apartment consists of wooden & tiled flooring, has three phase electricity supply with six air conditioners & a fitted ceiling fan for the sitting room, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer doors are fitted with Powder coated Aluminium frames, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of of individual shower cubicles, the apartment is elegantly furnished with quality furniture & equipped with all electrical appliances plus cookery & cutlery as well.
The complex consists of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, parking lots, a common large landscaped garden area, a large fish pond, a gym, two lifts & a standby generator ( a club house with swimming pool ,a day care, a gym,a function hall, a restaurant,a table tennis,squash etc)

SUITABLE FOR
Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

description:
A NEWLY BUILT LUXURY APARTMENT SITUATED ON THE THIRD FLOOR OF THE PROMENADE RESIDENCIES (CLOSE TO THE GALLE ROAD) AT SEA AVENUE-COLOMBO-03-FOR SALE

LOCATION
This newly built luxury apartment complex building is situated about 30 metrs from the Galle road, down Sea avenue in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured convenient location situated with close proximity to supermarkets, shopping malls, leading International as well as local schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office, many commercial establishments etc,etc, it is only about five minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location.

DESCRIPTION
It is an three bed roomed luxury & spacious apartment, elegantly furnished (with direct sea view) situated on the third floor of the building & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, three bed rooms including a spacious aster bed room with an attached bathroom, another common bathroom, an elegant open pantry area with fitted cupboards & a built in cooker with a hood, a separate small kitchen area, a maids room with an attached bathroom (which could be used as a study room as well) & three balcony areas with a magnificent sea view.

FACILITIES
The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with four air conditioners as well as fitted ceiling fans for all of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood, the outer windows are made using Powder coated Aluminum frames, the sitting & dinning room areas are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of individual shower cubicles, the apartment is elegantly furnished with quality new furniture & equipped with all electrical appliances.

The building consists of many common facilities such s 24 hour security, parking, two lifts with a standby generator, a common roof top terrace with a magnificent view of the sea, a gym ,regular maintenance & garbage disposal facilities etc,etc,

name: (*code no.2156-Apts for sale-Colombo-05
agency_address: No. 108, Asoka Mawatha, Sirimal Uyana, Ratmalana
description:
LUXURY THREE BED ROOMED AND FOUR BED ROOMED APARTMENTS COMING UP IN A BRAND NEW CONDOMINIUM BUILDING NAMED 'PARK HEIGHTS" SITUATED DOWN PARK ROAD-COLOMBO-05 (NOW OPEN FOR BOOKINGS)

LOCATION
This newly coming up condominium building is situated in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured convenient location down Park Road
(corner of Park Road and Fife Road with a private road on the third boundary) and is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, leading International & local schools,banks, hospitals, places of worship,post office etc.etc, it is only about fifteen minutes drive to the Colombo city center and close to most of the towns in & around Colombo and the suburbs, from this location.

DESCRIPTION
It consist of 27 floors, with ground plus five floors for parking, sixth floor will consist of a Management Office, Swimming Pool and a fully equipped gymnasium ,from 7th to the 27 th floors consisting of three bed roomed and four bed roomed duplex apartments (on two levels each), dividing in to three categories (3 bed rooms with a floor area of 1750 sq.ft each ) (four bed roomed duplex apartments with 2312 sq.ft each )(four bed roomed duplex apartments with 2247 sq.ft each)

Project will be completed in April 2018

FACILITIES
All the apartments will consist of fully tiled flooring, three phase electricity supply with air conditioner for the bed rooms, pipe borne water with hot water facility and a centralized overhead tank for storage, all the inner doors and the pantry cupboards will be made using quality wood, the outer windows will be fitted with powder coated Aluminium frames,the sitting & dinning room areas will be fitted with imported light fittings, all the bathrooms will be fitted with standard imported sanitary ware and will consists of individual shower cubicles.

The building will consist of many common facilities such as 24 hour security, a swimming pool & a gym, a common roof top terrace area with a magnificent view of the sea & the city,Dedicated parking spots for all apartments ,regular garbage disposal and maintenance services etc.etc.

SUITABLE FOR
Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

name_ta: (*code no.2160-Apt for sale-Ethul Kotte
name_si: (*code no.2160-Apt for sale-Ethul Kotte
name: (*code no.2160-Apt for sale-Ethul Kotte
agency_address: No. 108, Asoka Mawatha, Sirimal Uyana, Ratmalana
description:
A NEWLY BUILT THREE BED ROOMED LUXURY APARTMENT IN A CONDOMINIUM BUILDING WITH ONLY NINE APARTMENTS (ON THREE FLOORS) SITUATED DOWN MAHINDARAMA ROAD-ETHUL KOTTE-FOR SALE

LOCATION
This apartment is situated on the second floor of a newly built three storied building (with three floors & ample parking) situated down Mahindarama road about 50 meters from the main kotte road (close to the famous post office in Ethul kotte) & is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, the Gateway International, the British school, the Overseas International as well as other leading International as well as local schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc.etc, it is only about fifteen minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in &c. around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location.

DESCRIPTION
It is a three bed roomed luxury & spacious three bed roomed apartment & consists of a spacious sitting & dinning room, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with an attached bathroom, another common bathroom, an elegant open pantry area with fitted cupboards & three balcony areas including a spacious front balcony & two individual balcony areas for the bed rooms.

FACILITIES
The apartment is fully tiled, has three phase electricity supply with three air conditioners as well as fitted ceiling fans for all of the areas, has pipe borne water supply with hot water facilities & an centralized overhead tank for storage, all of the inner doors & the pantry cupboards are made using quality wood with tiled counter tops for the pantry area, the outer windows are fitted with powder coated Aluminum frames, the sitting & dinning rooms are fitted with imported light fittings, all of the bathrooms are fitted with standard imported sanitary ware & consists of individual shower cubicles.

The building consists of many common facilities such as parking, a lift & a standby generator, regular garbage disposal & maintenance facilities etc.etc.

SUITABLE FOR
Foreigners, As well as Lankan expats,

name_ta: Brand new 4 Room apartment for long lease at 110 Parliment Road, Rajagiriya
name_si: Brand new 4 Room apartment for long lease at 110 Parliment Road, Rajagiriya
name: Brand new 4 Room apartment for long lease at 110 Parliment Road, Rajagiriya
description:
A suitable for leasing Unit 21G in ICONIC (110 Parliament Road) from February/March 2014.
Details of the apartment and our Tenant requirements are as follows:
1. Four Rooms ( 3 Bed Rooms plus Office Room). Living / Dining, Kitchen (Pantry), Utility (Maids) Room with Toilet and Balcony. Layout plan is attached
2. Total Floor area = 203.49 sq meters or 2190.36 sq. ft
3. Car Park (Two vehicles can be parked with Hydraulic parking gear- to be arranged if required)
4. Golf Bag storage locker near service lift at ground floor.

We are looking for expatriate party on long term. We are expecting a minimum rent of USD 2,000/month and Lease of 1, 2 or 3 year period. One year advance payment plus two months deposit. Utilities on Tenants account.
We have furnished the Living/Dining Room and Rooms will be arranged by mid-February
